1.content:
You groaned awake as light hit your face, you tried to pull your blankets over you but suddenly realized there WERE no blankets! Suddenly a smell hit you, it smelt like a swamp! You shot up and looked around before realizing you WERE in a swamp!

You noticed a sign that said "Beware of Ogre" and a drawing of an oh si familiar ogre and it dawned on you... you were in a swamp! Not only that but you were only a couple of inches tall! Suddenly a voice and a boom broke through your thoughts and you turned around to see
1.title: Once upon a time...

11.content:
Shrek! He was mostly naked and walking through his swamp, you didn't know where he was going but he could help! You called out his name but he didn't seem to hear you as he stepped over, and almost on, you.

You blinked in surprise as the ogre continued walking, and you followed behind as he headed toward...
11.title: Shrek

info.description:
Have you ever wanted to be tiny and at the mercy of our ogerlord? Heres your chance! You wake up 2 inches tall in a swamp and there is our ogerlord Shrek!

Try to do mostly males, I'll leave options for other characters but I want this Male-focused

You can't die

Other than that nothing's off limits!
